locations.name: Frozen Mountains
locations.description: A cold wilderness filled with freezing winds, an ice dragon and deep crevasses. There is a hidden treasure somewhere within..

locations.name: Arid Desert
locations.description: A barren land with scorching temperatures, a giant sand worm and decieving mirages. Somewhere lies a buried treasure chest..

locations.name: Rotten Swamp
locations.description: A humid bog teeming with poisonous plants, a hideous monster and quicksand. A precious treasure can be found here somewhere..

locations.name: Misty Woods
locations.description: A haunted forest with terrifying ghosts, a goliath spider and trees that come alive. There exists a priceless treasure at the center..
